Shademail Haubergeon

armor (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 224
armor id [armor]: 186 (Shademail Haubergeon)
protection, body [protbody]: 13
stealth [stealth]: +20

Requires 10D5E to forge (D2E1)

A dark haubergeon enchanted to be exceptionally light and durable. It gives the wearer the ability to blend into shadows and is therefore popular among thieves and murderers.
